title: Table of Function Values - Inverse and Composition

content.description:
<math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>
 <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math>
 <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math>
 <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math>
 <math alttext="4"><mn>4</mn></math>

<math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses"> <mi>h</mi> <mfenced> <mi>x</mi> </mfenced> </math>
 <math alttext="4"><mn>4</mn></math>
 <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math>
 <math alttext="3"> <mn>3</mn> </math>
 <math alttext="6"><mn>6</mn></math>

<math alttext="k open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math>
 <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math>
 <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math>
 <math alttext="4"><mn>4</mn></math>
 <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math>

The table gives values for the invertible functions <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> and <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> at selected values of <math alttext="x"> <mi>x</mi> </math>.
content.question: What is the value of  <math alttext="h inverse open parentheses k open parentheses 3 close parentheses close parentheses"> <msup> <mi>h</mi> <mrow> <mo>-</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msup> <mfenced> <mrow> <mi>k</mi> <mfenced> <mn>3</mn> </mfenced> </mrow> </mfenced> </math> ?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
